LanguageData.GeneElevationProgress: {0} has moved one step close to being a {1}.
LanguageData.ElevatingPausedNoPower: Building has no power, process has been paused.
LanguageData.NotEnoughFuelPresent: Building needs {0} amount of geneseed capsules to operate on {1}.
LanguageData.GenesCannotBeElevated: {0}'s genes cannot be elevated any more.
LanguageData.InsertPersonGeneseedGenetorDesc: Insert a person into the automated genetor. It will use genetic material from provided geneseed capsules to slowly elevate the pawns genes.
LanguageData.CannotIncreaseEffectiveness: Cannot increase {0}'s potential, it is already maxed.
LanguageData.MayNotHaveGene: Cannot increase {0}'s {1} potential. {0} may not have the {2} gene.
LanguageData.CommandCancelProcedureDesc: Cancel the procedure. The contained person will be ejected.
LanguageData.InsertPersonWarpAdjusterDesc: Insert a person into the device. It will use {0} potential material from provided capsules.
LanguageData.PotentialHarvestKillChance: Chance to kill when harvesting potential.
LanguageData.KillChanceOnHarvest: Kill chance on psychic or blank potential harvesting: {0}%
LanguageData.CheckVEFPatches: Remember to check Vanilla Expanded Framework toggable patches for more settings!
LanguageData.progenoidHarvestsAllXenogenes: Enabling this will allow the harvest of the progenoid gland to include all xenogenes of the pawn instead of only space marine genes.
LanguageData.psykerPariahBirth: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as psykers and pariahs.
LanguageData.psychicPhenomena: Enabling this will make psykers who are experiencing mental breakdowns create a psychic phenoma.
LanguageData.UnbreakingLoyaltySpaceMarine: Enabling this makes all space marines unrecruitable and unable to be enslaved, meaning you cannot imprison them and then recruit or enslave them.
LanguageData.CannotRecruitMessage: {1} tried to recruit {0}, but {0}'s unbreakable loyalty to their faction made them resist all attempts.\n\n{0} cannot be recruited.
LanguageData.CannotEnslaveMessage: {1} tried to enslave {0}, but {0}'s unbreakable loyalty to their faction made them resist all attempts.\n\n{0} cannot be enslaved.
LanguageData.NaturalBornXMessage: From the moment {0} became pregnant something felt off, something that has finally come to light. It seems that {1} has been born as a natural {2}.
LanguageData.Annihilation: A psychic blast surged through {0} and into the world, causing a warp explosion completely annihilating {0} and severely damaging everything around them.
LanguageData.DaemonHost: A strong link was established between {0} and one of the chaos gods, allowing them to send in some daemons.
LanguageData.UncontrollablePowers: In a temporary loss of control over their powers, {0} caused a warp explosion, causing damage to everyone near them.
LanguageData.PsychicComa: Overwhelmed by the warp made {0} fall into a psychic coma.
LanguageData.PsychicConnectionSevered: In an instant {0} no longer felt any connection to the warp, as if completely cut off.
LanguageData.BloodRain: As if a cruel joke, blood suddenly starts raining.
LanguageData.PlantRot: All plant life seems to rot in {0} presence, leaving it lifeless.
LanguageData.SMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Space Marine geneseed extraction not researched
LanguageData.NoProgenoidGlands: Does not have any progenoid glands
LanguageData.PMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Primaris Marine geneseed extraction not researched
